page.title: 05CASTLE BYTHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school is made of bricks,stone it also has a large playing field and an orchard which contains apples pears and plum trees. We have got central heating now but I remember when we had big iron coke burners with a big iron guard round it and when it was cold we all crowded round it. Our school has had a BBC micro computer since 1983 and now we have got a disc drive and a printer as well. When the children have finished this school they take an examination to decide which secondary school they will go to.All the schools are in Stamford,which is ten miles away.They are the Fane and Exeter(secondary modern)and High School and Stamford School(Grammar Schools).
